00015 TestCaseRootObject_1::TestCaseRootObject_1(void) :
00016         TestCaseGenericSetUp(ID_ROOTOBJECT*10+1,"TestCaseRootObject_1") {
00017                 return;
00018 }
00019 
00020 void TestCaseRootObject_1::runTestCase(void) {
00021 
00022      CC_RootObject* pr1 = new CC_RootObject();
00023      CC_RootObject* pr2 = new CC_RootObject();
00024      CC_RootObject* pr3 = new CC_RootObject();
00025 
00026         if ( pr2->getInstanceId() != (pr1->getInstanceId()+1) )
00027         {       setTestResult(TEST_FAILURE, "Incorrect setting of instance identifier");
00028                 return;
00029         }
00030 
00031         if ( pr3->getInstanceId() != (pr2->getInstanceId()+1) )
00032         {       setTestResult(TEST_FAILURE, "Incorrect setting of instance identifier");
00033                 return;
00034         }
00035 
00036         setTestResult(TEST_SUCCESS,"Test Successful");
00037         return;
00038 }
